Class WaiterThread<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • i5.las2peer.tools.WaiterThread<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class WaiterThread<T>
extends java.lang.Thread
    A simple thread waiting for a result.
